Posts.Title: And the mystery continues. AlaskaDeb Binney4

Posts.Content: Oct 24, 2007 09:34AM watergirl wrote: "I did taxol for four rounds and I am in unbelievable pain throughout all of my muscles and joints. he said that he was perplexed by it."  Jackie, I can't imagine why your onc is perplexed by joint and muscle pain after Taxol.  From my experience and these boards is a somewhat common side effect.  I had no joint pain during chemo, but it kicked in about a month afterwards and stayed for about 4 months.  Every joint in my body was stiff and sore, it felt like I was 100 years old every time I moved after sitting for a bit.  My onc just said, don't worry it will go away and it eventually did.  As for the scans oncs do things a bit different, I think follow up is more of an art than a science.
